titleStmt.title: By the Lords Justices, a proclamation ... whereas we formerly received information ... that one Henry Every, commander of this ship called the Phansie ... committed several acts of piracy ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Lords Justices.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Charles Bill, and the executrix of Thomas Newcomb ...,

notesStmt.note: Other title information taken from first four lines of text.
"Given at the council chamber at Whitehall, the tenth day of August, 1696, in the eighth year of His Majesties reign."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
